001.comments: Registration in this course is by application only. Learn more at mybcom.sauder.ubc.ca/comm466. Students may receive credit for only one of COMM 466 and COMM 497.

002.comments: Registration in this course is by application only. Learn more at mybcom.sauder.ubc.ca/comm466. Students may receive credit for only one of COMM 466 and COMM 497.

description: Teams comprising students in COMM 466 and APSC 486 propose a new product, produce a viable prototype, and develop a business plan for the marketplace.  Credit may only be obtained for one of COMM 466, COMM 497, COEC 497, COMR 497, and APSC 486.
